# Walltime & memory


## How long will your job run?

- Specify walltime (`--time=HH:MM:SS`)
- But how much?
  - Don't underestimate!
  - Don't (massively) overestimate
- Experiment
  - Start with "small" problem
  - Increase problem size gradually
  - Extrapolate to real problem
